name: esbuild
description: The Nx Plugin for esbuild contains executors and generators that support building applications using esbuild

generators.name: esbuild-project

schema.title: Add esbuild configuration to a project
schema.description: Add esbuild configuration to a project.

project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project to set up a esbuild for?

main.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the main entry file. Defaults to `<project-root>/src/main.ts` or `<project-root>src/index.ts`, whichever is found.

tsConfig.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the tsconfig file to build with. Defaults to `<project-root>/tsconfig.app.json` or `<project-root>/tsconfig.lib.json`, whichever is found.

skipValidation.description: Do not perform any validation on existing project.

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`.

schema.examplesFile:
```bash
nx g @nrwl/esbuild:esbuild-project my-package
```

{% callout type="note" title="Overwriting existing build option" %}
The `esbuild-projet` generator validates that an existing `build` target isn't already defined for the project. If you are adding esbuild to a project with an existing `build` target, pass the `--skipValidation` option.
{% /callout %}

You may also provide a custom main entry file, or a custom tsconfig file if the defaults don't work. By default, the generator will look for a main file matching `src/index.ts` or `src/main.ts`, and a tsconfig file matching `tsconfig.app.json` or `tsconfig.lib.json`.

```bash
nx g @nrwl/esbuild:esbuild-project my-package \
--main=packages/my-package/src/entry.ts \
--tsConfig=packages/my-package/tsconfig.custom.json
```

generators.description: Add esbuild configuration to a project.

schema.title: esbuild (experimental)
schema.description: Bundle a package for different platforms. Note: declaration (*.d.ts) file are not currently generated.

main.description: The path to the entry file, relative to project.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

outputFileName.description: Name of the main output file. Defaults same basename as 'main' file.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply `glob`. Defaults to the project root.

output.description: Relative path within the output folder.

external.description: Mark one or more module as external. Can use * wildcards, such as '*.png'.

outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

metafile.description: Generate a meta.json file in the output folder that includes metadata about the build. This file can be analyzed by other tools.

skipTypeCheck.description: Skip type-checking via TypeScript. Skipping type-checking speeds up the build but type errors are not caught.

buildableProjectDepsInPackageJsonType.description: When `updateBuildableProjectDepsInPackageJson` is `true`, this adds dependencies to either `peerDependencies` or `dependencies`.

esbuildOptions.description: Additional options to pass to esbuild. See https://esbuild.github.io/api/.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply `glob`. Defaults to the project root.

output.description: Relative path within the output folder.
